posts.message:
guys I think we need some clarification with Garantex - from what I understand from their people and from the document they sent we only get TransactionID and sum of transaction from them for new orders (see atached pic).

I think our treasuries require the payer name and details and beneficiary name and details for compliance, or am I missing something?
in the pic above you see how they send a new request to us - meaning a new order
this is all the details they send according to the document
Hi, maybe it is a test document?
just to understand the flow - when they send us a new order - we HAVE to have payer and beneficiary right?
we cannot do anything without full details of both
or maybe this is a new flow I am missing?

hey @lshumakov119 update:
1. @vic spoke to stas today to get approval for the HLD document
2. Stas said this is not the process - I was wondering then why he gave us a person that cannot depict the whole process to us.
3. @vic agreed with Stas that our PM (Evgeny) will spend a couple of days with their team to learn the process and update the HLD accordingly
4. @vic and myself are going to meet Stas tomorrow around 17:00 to discuss due process of creating their application and have some kind of stable plan we can follow.

You are more than welcome (I would really love it if you did) to join us at the meeting tomorrow. let us know if you can join.

Additional updates:
1. we already started working on their CRM core functionality (we can change details as the system is plugable)
2. the API for Garantex Sandbox (!!) will be deployed tonight so we can give them a first version and start working on a real integration process.
I`ll try to discuss it with garantex tommorrow
guys did you see the correspondence with 4A in whatsapp???
the probably have hard coded urls inside the code and they moxed the pre prod and prod environments!\
vic created this channel from a group message with admin, lshumakov119 and vic.
mikhails added to the channel by vic.
vic updated the channel display name from: Coordination to: IT workgroup
@vic hi, have you checked link with the code?

one more link from Artem's letter 
[https://disk.yandex.ru/d/xMMWliqnuHbsbw](https://disk.yandex.ru/d/xMMWliqnuHbsbw)

Hey @mikhails this website is NOT hosted on our servers and the certificate is not initiated by us.

Friends, this is what I am talking about - these sabotaging way of working without proper monitoring and without maintenance is amateur at best.

we need to instruct ALL companies to host and give control to Anykey.pro to ALL technical services.
@mikhails I will try to findout who bought the domain a7-agent.ru and who generated the certificate - I want these to be owned and maintained by us immedietly!
this look very very bad to customers!

this is the info from the whois:
```
% TCI Whois Service. Terms of use:
% https://tcinet.ru/documents/whois_ru_rf.pdf (in Russian)
```

Wow, our web site not on our host, sounds very bad
I don't know who bought the domain and built a website without telling us but this is VERY BAD
if I am a customer , I would never look at this company again
I've found how hosted, he made new one. Tomorrow I try to solve this problem
don't solve the problem only - they need to give us control over the domain, host the website on our servers and we will manage certificates etc.
It is a very weak point
it looks like a 5 years old is maintaining this server
@mikhails lets try to fix this tonight already, can you ask who bought the domain a7-agent.ru and the certificate and where the webserver is hosted?
I found who can do it, and he did
the fact that this happened is a disaster
Tomorrow I ll talk with him
this need to be monitored by us completely
otherwise we will use another domain for everything on their side - period.

@mikhails please schedule a meeting with you, Vladimir Isaev and me this week to discuss moving them to our infrastructure (@lshumakov119 please approve, @vic please approve) also it would be great if @vic and @lshumakov119 can join :pray:
ok, i ll try to schedule it. what slots are there for this week?
tomorrow after 15:00 im free, wednesday after 14:00 - also Thursday for now
@admin @vic @lshumakov119  tomorrow at 16.30 meeting with Isaev on berezhkovskaya
@admin Hi, may be you know. https://a7goldinvest.ru/ is this domain managed by us?
just make inventory, because last time, you remember we recognized that another domain managed by someone else
@admin @vic  we need make a meeting on friday, at 16:00 on berezhkovskaya, please confirm
I will be in Moscow at 8

@vic @admin hi
two month ago we've discuss that we need some tasktracker and wiki , which we (IT and project offices from business) will use to control projects, have  transparent process
also i ask you about some instrument for helpdesk, where users can make request and choose type of request, where they can see time of response and time of solution of their problem. 

now team Anykey uses some, bit it is not convenient for not anykey (for me also), thats why i ask you to   check this solution https://www.evateam.ru/evaproject/
it can be installed on-premiss
or suggest another one


for the second point. yesterday we discuss with Liran that you can make some custom product for helpdesk, which should be used by business-units. what kind of information you need from me to start this project? or we can by on-prem https://intradesk.ru/
 and use this solution

also we discussed that anykey have to sign Framework agreement with all companies a7 group
where describe  all conditions and scope of work, which would be done by Anykey. 
after that all real task should be done by additional agreements or orders to the Framework agreement

in what period of time can you prepare all this Framework agreement
we need do it, because companies need to reflect in accounting such works, some of them will be CAPEX, some of them OPEX

For Helpdesk we are using GLPI (talk to mish he can open you a user) for ticketing
For project management we are implementing and adopting openproject (https://www.openproject.org/)
I suggest to sign OPEX based agreements with all companies - there is no need to do CAPEX unless there are extreme cases

simply put:
OPEX- operational costs - a monthly cost
CAPEX - Capital extpenses - single time projects

since anykey.pro is an in house IT company there should be a constant retainer from each company that will include ALL operations at least for development projects

please ask him to do it, because i wait for his answers long time

when we will start using this solution, i mean openproject

and what about project wiki or library? open project has no self-solution, may be we need to use nextcloud?
and after all what about contracts, when we start this process, in case of a lot of companies it takes time to approve this contract with all participants

openproject has wiki and a lot of other functionalities - you will like it - we have already started using it internally and will increase usage as we go along - I will create a user for you - what is your company email?
may be is there needed any vpn?
i  look at that. if i have some qu–µstions, who can answer me? who support this system?
I am managing projects for now until we will get a full grasp of how to use the tool properly
@vic @admin please push a little bit Mikhail (nickname Gabriel) for two days wrote him , but he ignored me, that's not very polite
can you give permissions to create task,projects,make article—ã in wiki
i wrote him on last friday and monday, not at night
what projects/wiki/tasks you want to create?
just try, and understand how it works and so on
I will create you a test project and make you admin there
I also sent you username and password for jitsi as an admin so you can create rooms and manage them

@admin we have a task to make integration between master system and external treasury (Egypt and some more). integration is similar like integration between MS and Stas treasury. 
which way of suggested do you prefer?
@admin Hi, can you answer this question please?

Our preferred option is API (second option) we can establish a Kafka or other queuing mechanism on our side but either way we would like to track and audit requests.

Contract based communication (wee established API) is always better then a queue
When on Friday you can meet  them? I ll arrange a meeting
@admin hi, when can i arrange a meeting today?

@admin  when can i arrange a meeting tomorrow? on this meeting i want ot discuss technical questions how integration between MS and extrenal treasury can be  organized (i remember that you suggest to use HTTPS connection and use API (the second way described in document which i sent )
around 15:00 will be good for me who else you need on this meeting?
I think you will be enough
ahh - I thought we scheduled in my office?
@admin hi, smth happend with vpn, do you know about this problem?
provider said they had electricity issue use another vpn we have many
admin updated the channel display name from: IT workgroup  to: ‚ÜóÔ∏è IT workgroup

@admin hi, I want to ask to make tomorrow till midday two things: 1. To make backup of db and volume of current master system and make it every day till 14th of July 
And save this db on your storage

2. To give me the source code of master system from git which is used for current master system . 

Thanks a lot

backup db and volume
transfer to prod will be only after testing last changes. 14-17 thod july. befor that we should protect from 
unfair actions by 4A

we have the source code in our git and the DB is located on our system, we will create double backups daily I will ask for that.

do you anticipate sabotage on their behalf?
if so I think we should be prepared to also block vpn access
I think one of them has to deploy piplines (build and test)
do you anticipate sabotage on their behalf? - i m not sure, but it would be better to protect ourself
will take proper actions please await my confirmation before taking any extreme actions with them :pray:
source code is needed for another activity which also related with potential risk of their potentional sabotage
we do noting , just prepair for bad scenario
ah - ok thats what I said we are preparing proper backups tomorrow
Are they ready to transfer us their code and description?
the code we pull everytime we build it - that was my demand from day 0
but BL is not shared with us
DB is also on our premises
just now there are no critical signals for concern, but there are occasional warning signs
as a default I would always prefer to prep for worst case scenario
Hi! We want to try to take control at 4A code in case they refuse to continue to work with us, so we need to try to decode it and we have a potential specialists who can try to do it.

IMPORTANT!!!

I just found out someone bought the domain usdkg.com in google domains!!!
this domain will be blocked.
Please find out who is holding it and why they allowed themselves to buy domains and raise google emails (completely exposed to US government!!!) without discussing with us???

@lshumakov119 @msvintsitskiy - awaiting response

I think A7A5 (Timur) bought it but im not sure - @arnold told me about it and I did some checking.
This is a disaster that people who do not understand the implications take actions like this
@admin hi, how could tomorrow give access to code of master system? Colleagues come tomorrow to skolkovo office by 11:00

Its a question that we discussed last week - we bring a contractor to office and give them limited access, so they can analyze master system code and tell us if they can support it while we are making new CRM
ohh - great  context ;) ok Ill arrange it
ok please prep them for our interview tomorrow
@admin how can we give access to code of master system to colleagues? Now we have no laptop to them
Office is ready. 2 computers are ready
Where are these people and how many people are they?
Now they are on 4th floor, where they should come
I'll ask @alexanderbesk to meet them at the lift area
Tell me then they will come
I can be out of connection soon
All is alright , Alexandr met us
@admin @vic there is no access to code yet
@admin The meeting at 16:00 is valid? colleagues have arrived
I will do my best might be 30m late ( I am close in another meeting)
@admin guys, who review code which we gave , told that they have only front end part on is, and they need also backend part , can we give it to them ?
Can I go direct to Jarom and ask him to give other part?
im in my office you can come

we have a request from some clients of a7-agent about security of application which is used  for data exchange 
availability of certificates, licenses, developer reputation
availible processes to protect  from hacking and hacker attacks.

i've i undersatd right now we have no audit sertification of IS, we have no good reputation developer (4a)
may be can describe some about hacking and hacker attacks.

@admin what do you think about it?
@vic i have request from Isaev, look at this please  till tomorrow and we can discuss it

@admin taday Lev and Ilya told me that they have several unsolved questions:

5.‚Å† ‚Å†–õ–µ–Ω–¥–∏–Ω–≥–æ–≤–∞—è —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü–∞ –¥–ª—è –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ PT Lintas Indo Niaga

@lshumakov119 this is the first time I hear about ALL these tasks, so either Lev and Ilya have tasks they want to do but not tell anyone - or the presentation "unresolved question" is faulty.

I can accept that they have NEW requests and we will deal with them.

Also we have a procedure for new domains/landing pages and email servers that we follow - they can contact me for further assistance directly.

BTW I was in 1h meeting with Lev today and he did not mention any of the above.
the last message is from Jarom and me on 9th of July in the Email group
@lshumakov119 who told you these are "unsolved questions"?
they are not known to anyone
I am wondering who presented them to you as pending questions which are unsolved?
thats why I am asking who presented them as such?
Guys, specially for you I will take my time and find date and tome when these tasks were given.
you can try but the fact that no one on our team knows about them nor they are listed in ANY group is going to be an issue
nevertheless it is interesting who presnted these topics as "unresolved questions"
it is important to establish a proper channel of communication regarding requests
we did that with domains/emails/web pages but for some reason these requests are not present anywhere - let alone the vpn requests that I first heard about from you

Do we a have a communication system between business and IT, where they can ask for an e-mail, vpn or new keyboard? System in which each request is sent to dedicated specialist and time is controlled?

not anyone can ask for vpn or domain name there are authorized people I have been given and they added relevant personnel to the proper channels and boards.

my question is who presented you these tasks as "unresolved questions" while no one is aware they are required
I find it hard to believe it was Lev since he would ask me today while I was in his office for an hour

Its not a secret - Ilya asked when we can solve it since the request from his side was made 2 weeks ago, but he did not contact IT directly, and did it through Lev. Anyway I don't think that anyone of them will give untrue information. I will likely believe that someone from IT have forgotten about the request because I myself asked for VPN and IP-phone several times before I got them. Sorry but its my own experience.

regarding the VPN - no one asked for it - neither the domains - I am waiting for you to provide the date and time with proof it was asked from ANY of the relevant personnel .

there is no need for the passive-agressive tone - we are just trying to establish a proper way of communication
to simplify - if someone had a "wishful thinking" that a vpn and domains will appear magically without notifying anyone - we have a problem on the business side - we are not telepathic
lets have a meeting with Ilya tomorrow - I want to understand who he asked these requests from - @lshumakov119 can you arrange this meeting please?

We are getting complaints about a7a5.kg website - the servers are wokring fine but it seems that there are a lot of errors in the code.
I have spoken to the developer of the website (Nikolai) but he refused to give us the code for review, @lshumakov119 can you assist please?
I proposed him to arrange a meeting. there was a blockchain problem which they finally fixed and server down problem, source of which I dont understand
we need to review the code can you please ask them to give us access to their git server?
Timur just promised to give you site code
@vic Isaev waiting for your answer, please look what they ve written
Hallo all. What about technical description from Vladimir Isaev?
Friday chief called to Isaev in front of me, liran and Leonid
And gave him 3 days for making technical description
And he wants us to start developing
Just spoke to Vladimir - he is going to give description tommorow
Now there is no decision that development will be done totally by Anykey. So firstly please analyze it and then we will discuss.
I have a strict instruction from chief that we are developing it
Please analyze it first of all.

@admin send me please today requirements for developers and BA for outstaffing teams
Thanks

also we have to make two product teams for   –ê7 retail chain
this team should consist of
teamlead developer back
developer back
teamlead developer front
developer front
BA/SA
web designer
IT Lead

One of the teams will be working on the client's personal account
another will be working on the internal user's system

may be we should do one more team - i will ask business

this both teams will be work only with two product respectively

 tasks which should be done would be coordinate in this teams
architecture/ way of coding/ way how analysis should be done remains within the corresponding directions

if you don't have the resources for that teams we can get them on outstaf, thats why i ask about  requirements 

to the end of the week we have to create this product teams
Also I need a list of projects with PMs, current status and business customer.
